0.description: Cannot connect to the registry. Check if the registry is running and accessible.

400.description: The registry couldn't understand the request. This might be a configuration issue.

401.description: The registry requires valid credentials. Check your username and password configuration.

403.description: Your credentials are valid but you don't have permission to access this registry.

404.description: The registry endpoint was not found. Check the registry URL configuration.

408.description: The registry is taking too long to respond. It might be slow or overloaded.

429.description: Too many requests sent to the registry. Please wait before trying again.

500.description: The registry encountered an internal error. Contact the registry administrator.

502.description: There's an issue with the proxy or gateway to the registry.

503.description: The registry is temporarily unavailable. It might be under maintenance.

504.description: The gateway timed out waiting for the registry to respond.

520.description: An unexpected error occurred while connecting to the registry.

521.description: The registry server is down and refusing connections.

522.description: Could not establish a connection to the registry server.

523.description: The registry server cannot be reached. Check the network connection and URL.

524.description: Connected to the registry but it didn't respond in time.

525.description: Failed to establish a secure connection to the registry.

526.description: The registry's SSL certificate is invalid or expired.
